LightningComponentBundle.description: Enhanced datatable to display related records with lots of functionality

property.name: relatedObjectApiName
property.label: Related Object Name
property.description: API Name of the object related to this one that owns the data to display in the table. e.g. Contact

property.name: fieldApiName
property.label: Field API Name
property.description: API Name of the field in the related object that links it to this record. e.g. AccountId

property.name: customMetadataName
property.label: Custom Metadata Name
property.description: This is the custom metadata name that contains the configuration in JSON format. You need to build the table in a flow and use the Copy Configuration Button which will copy the configuration to the clipboard, then create a custom metadata record (OD_Datatable_JSON_Configuration__mdt) and use the Name here.
